### What is this?

This is a landing page template for an AI agent startup. The template is built with Next.js, TailwindCSS, and Motion, optimized for showcasing AI agent services.

### Who is this for?

You are launching a new AI agent startup and need a professional, eye-catching landing page to showcase your product's features.

### Why should I use this?

- ✅ Save 500+ hours of work
- ✅ Landing Page with 9 sections
- ✅ Dark mode support
- ✅ 100% Mobile responsive
- ✅ SEO optimized
- ✅ Interactive animations
- ✅ Workflow visualization components
- ✅ Clean and maintainable code
- ✅ Global config for easy updates
- ✅ Easy customization
- ✅ 1-click download and setup
- ✅ Deploy live to Vercel

### Features

- Landing Page with 9 sections
  - Header Section
  - Hero Section
  - Logos Section
  - Features Bento Grid Section
  - Testimonials Section
  - Pricing Section
  - FAQ Section
  - CTA Section
  - Footer Section
- Dark mode support
- 100% Mobile responsive
- Full SEO coverage
- Dynamic OpenGraph images for every page
- Tons of animations / micro-interactions
- Clean and maintainable code
- Global constants and variables for color, text, and more

### Dependencies

- Next.js 15
- React 18.3
- TypeScript 5
- TailwindCSS 3.4
- Framer Motion 11.3
- next-themes 0.3.0
- radix-ui
- shadcn/ui
